climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC: Certified according to the USDA NOP Program, the strictest organic standard in the world. Always check to ensure a product carries the USDA Organic logo. NON-GMO.

PRIMARY STEAM-DISTILLED BY ALTEYA: Distilled directly from fresh Rosa Damascena Bulgaria petals, and via Alteya's proprietary methodology that combines traditions with science to capture the most complete range of aromatic plants’ benefits, with rich composition of essential oil micro-elements and full concentration of hydrophilic components. As a result, our organic rose water has multiple skin benefits and applications in beauty and wellbeing.

CLEAN EFFECTIVE SKINCARE: Suitable for ALL skin types. May benefit skin by supporting skin rejuvenation and renewal. Also known to help soften, tone and hydrate skin by providing essential micronutrients and maintaining proper skin’s pH balance. May also help calm skin and relieve redness.
AWARD-WINNING: Also featured in People Magazine, ELLE, In-Style, Delicious Living, Organic Spa, New York Fashion Week, and many others.

FROM ALTEYA'S ROSES AND ALTEYA's DISTILLERY: Just one ingredient, 100% Pure Steam-Distilled Certified Organic "Alteya" Rosa Damascena Skin-grade Distillate. Straight from the heart of the Bulgarian Rose Valley. Alteya's rose water does not have the strong artificial aroma of rose perfumes or of the other rose varieties domesticated roses sold at florist shops (they are different rose types with no skin care properties). It is not water mixed with essential oils or created in a lab.

FULL TRACEABILITY: Boasts the most full and complete traceability in the world - crafted in our own distillery from our own organic rose gardens utilizing our own source of healing underground spring water
body.description: 100% organically grown and ethically harvested from our family rose farm in the Bulgarian Rose Valley. For many years in the heart of the Bulgarian Rose Valley, Alteya has been growing and cherishing the beautiful Rosa damascena flower

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The real stuff, no oils added
reviews.reviewText: Bought 19 times and never wrote a review. So to help those out with sensitive skin. Buy this, it's a great product. I use it before putting on hyaluronic acid, as apparently it's important for the serum to have water to bind to, otherwise the hyaluronic acid pulls moisture from deep within your skin. I also set my (mineral powder) make-up with it or use it as an all-round refresher. My GF was getting breakouts from another product not realizing it had added oils in it. This is real actual rosewater, no oils. Yes it does not smell as strongly as those products, but I buy this for skin benefits, it's not a perfume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you ask me this is a great buy. My skin loves this
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Rose water as a part of my face washing regimen daily for about a year now. This last a very long time especially if you use a spray bottle to apply! My little sister also uses this (I guess you could say we share it) but with 2 people using this on a daily basis I'm surprised at how long it's lasted without me having to buy again! The only thing I don't really care for is the scent of this product! It's a very strong floral scent and kind of reminds me of dirt lol but at the same time the scent makes it feel more organic also! If you ask me this is a great buy. My skin loves this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good moisturizing mist with a light rose scent. I use it at night after cleansing & in the a.m. to set my make up. It gives my foundation a dewy, smoother finish. I've used 3 other brands of rose water & definately prefer this one. I ordered 2 bottles but was sent only one. I contacted the seller & within a few days they sent me the one plus a bonus bottle. Great customer service!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does great things for problem skin!
reviews.reviewText: This does really AMAZING things for my reactive, acne-prone skin: It helps decrease redness/flushing and seems to soothe troubled skin. I've been using it as a toner, with an extra spritz under my eye cream at night, and my problem skin actually looks nice! I took one star off my review because the scent is a little more earthy and rooty than expected. Admittedly, I'm used to cheaper versions of rose water that smell like grandma's tea roses, and this is clearly much nicer, but still the scent is a bit of a surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product works very well on my skin. I mix it with witch hazel and tea tree oil and use it as my facial cleanser. It works like magic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No Protective Seal
reviews.reviewText: Very strong rose smell. It came in an opened (damaged) wet box. Product had no protective seal. It leaked a 1/4 of the bottle. Could have happened during delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful product for use with rosacea prone skin. Glad that it's available again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've used and loved the white rose water from this brand as well
reviews.reviewText: I've used and loved the white rose water from this brand as well, so I decided to try this one, and it's just as lovely and hydrating to the skin. The fragrance is fresh and natural and I like that I can feel confident using it on my skin since it's organic and pure, real rose water (not rose oil and additives). Even with daily use the bottle lasts quite a while. In the summer it's especially nice to carry with me and spritz when I get too warm. It calms redness right down. I'll continue to buy this, and the white rose water.
Profumo fantastico per chi ama le rose. Consigliatissimo

Immer wieder Alteya, ich bin sehr zufrieden von diese Bulgarische Marke. In Bulgarien ist das beste Rosenwasser Produktionen, weil da die Rosen und das Klima sehr gut geeignet für die Rosen sind. Ich bestelle mir immer wieder von Alteya 😍🥰🌞
Es la única agua de rosas que encontré sin perfume, es 100% natural y el atomizador está perfecto. La tengo en el refri y la uso después de lavarme la cara antes de ponerme la crema de día/noche.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great product for my routine skin care
reviews.reviewText: Great to put on after wash your face to provide moisture!! 😍
Lo uso despues de la ducha como tónico facial y es sublime, deja la piel fresca y viva. Huele a rosas recién cosechadas
